tweet_text: Phineas and Ferb are known for their innovative and creative inventions, so it is suggested that if they were real, they would have already created a vaccine for COVID-19.
The speaker was a vaccine checker at a venue and encountered a couple who asked "vaccine for what," which the speaker found absurd.
The person asked a nurse if they could use their own bandaid for their vaccine and the nurse allowed it, but the person later experienced an issue with the bandaid.

In 1955, people eagerly lined up for the polio vaccine despite limited technology. In 2021, with advanced technology like smartphones and robots on Mars, some people are hesitant to get the COVID vaccine due to unfounded fears.
The speaker's mother did not experience any side effects from her second vaccine shot but gained a newfound appreciation for science.

A ballet student asked if the person was excited about getting the Covid-19 vaccine and referred to it as the "Fauci Ouchie," which the person found cute and will now use as a nickname for the vaccine.
The speaker, who is a nurse, is expressing frustration that Lindsey Graham, a politician, received a COVID-19 vaccine before they did.
Johnson & Johnson applied their knowledge of creating 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner to develop their vaccine.

The speaker's 10-year-old child was nervous about getting the Pfizer vaccine but kept whispering their high-risk best friend's name. The speaker has no regrets that their child overcame their fear to get vaccinated out of love for their friend.
Dolly Parton helped fund the COVID vaccine and it is disrespectful to refuse to take it after all her efforts.
The speaker's horse has worms and the pharmacy only has COVID vaccines available.

The writer's aunt, a lawyer who was about to retire and had all the vaccines, died of COVID-19 last night. She was a warrior for saving women from domestic violence and a proud volunteer of the House of Ruth for years. The writer mourns the loss of a beautiful soul.

The author had a conversation with Bill Gates about India's efforts to fight COVID-19, the work of the Gates Foundation in battling the pandemic, the role of technology and innovation, and producing a vaccine to cure the pandemic.

A Twitter user claims to have obtained a copy of Pfizer's manufacturing and supply agreement for their COVID-19 vaccine and is sharing details under the hashtag #PfizerLeak. The user alleges that Pfizer has been aggressive in protecting the details of their international agreements.

The author is making a sarcastic comment about the idea of the COVID-19 vaccine causing unrelated events, such as stepping on a Lego. They suggest that people should do their own research and not jump to conclusions.

The mRNA vaccines, such as Pfizer and Moderna, are scientifically brilliant. They work by introducing a small piece of genetic material called mRNA into the body, which instructs cells to produce a protein found on the surface of the COVID-19 virus. This triggers an immune response, preparing the body to fight off the virus if it is encountered in the future.

There is a myth that COVID-19 will go away in the summer months, but this is wrong as previous pandemics did not follow weather patterns and the virus is global. Additionally, as we enter summer in the Northern Hemisphere, there will be winter in the Southern Hemisphere.

BTS returned to the United Nations General Assembly to deliver a message on climate action, COVID-19 vaccines, and self-care. They were praised for inspiring young people and promoting a better world. #BTSLoveMyself
The statement suggests that if the COVID-19 vaccine was risky, it would have been administered to the less privileged first, rather than the wealthy and influential individuals.
The FDA has approved the first COVID-19 vaccine for individuals 16 years and older to prevent the disease.
A thrift store employee found a vaccine card from 1956 and felt it was timely given the current COVID-19 pandemic.

The Delta Variant of COVID-19 is spreading rapidly and is much more transmissible than the original virus. The majority of ICU admissions did not receive a vaccine and regret not doing so. The situation is overwhelming hospitals.

The author received the COVID-19 vaccine and experienced some soreness in their wing. They believe the vaccine will provide extra protection for themselves and others. The author was surprised to learn that they have been receiving vaccines since they were young.

The author received their first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine at AIIMS and commends the efforts of doctors and scientists in fighting the pandemic. They urge all eligible individuals to take the vaccine and work towards making India COVID-19 free.
The Omicron variant highlights the need for vaccine distribution to be more equitable, as rich nations and Big Pharma are prolonging the pandemic by blocking access to vaccines.
A person claims that the before and after pictures of them show the effects of the COVID-19 vaccine, and not enough people are talking about it. They provide a link to the pictures.

Oxford University was initially planning to open source its vaccine, but the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation convinced them to sell exclusive rights to AstraZeneca. However, AstraZeneca is now failing to deliver and poor countries are struggling to access vaccines.
The person made a joke about feeling "updog" after getting the vaccine, and the healthcare provider removed the syringe and did not administer the vaccine.
The author remembers a time when vaccine passports were called immunization records and no one was upset about it.

The author is expressing confusion about how people have decided that masks and vaccines are the biggest threat to American freedom, rather than other issues such as work hours, rent, college tuition, police, and celebrities like Ryan Seacrest.

A 66-year-old immigrant researcher worked on mRNA for four decades, rarely receiving grants and never having her own lab or earning more than $60K. Despite being considered foolish, her work is the basis for the Pfizer and Moderna vaccines.
Jin from BTS expresses sympathy for those who fear vaccines but believes that progress cannot be made if we are afraid of the past. President Moon smiles in response.
Politicians should acknowledge the history of medical abuse against Black people instead of blaming the Black community for not trusting the vaccine.
The statement highlights the irony of people being curious about the ingredients in the Covid vaccine, while not questioning the secret recipe of KFC's 11 herbs and spices for years.
The author claims that there is video proof that officials initially said the COVID-19 vaccine stopped transmission, but are now lying and saying they didn't. No further information is provided.
The president will implement nationwide mask mandates, ensure access to regular and free testing, and accelerate the development of treatments and vaccines to control the virus.
Some people refuse to get vaccinated because they are unsure of the contents, but they consume processed foods like hot dogs without questioning their ingredients.
People are concerned about the speed of the COVID-19 vaccine development in 9 months, but should also consider what else could be accomplished quickly if scientists had more funding and support.
An Alabama doctor has reported that some of her Covid patients, who are dying, have begged her for the vaccine before being intubated, but she has had to tell them it is too late.
The USA, UK and European Union have blocked Global South countries from manufacturing and importing affordable versions of the covid vaccines, which is devastating news for those countries.

The CDC states that 94% of coronavirus deaths had co-morbidities and less than 10,000 Americans died from Covid-19 alone. The claim is made that the virus is a hoax and Democrats used it to rig the election.

India has achieved record-breaking vaccination numbers, which is a positive development in the fight against COVID-19. The vaccine is still the strongest weapon against the virus, and congratulations are extended to those who have been vaccinated and the front-line workers who have worked hard to ensure citizens receive the vaccine.
The speaker is asking people to stop saying that the vaccine doesn't have severe side effects because they personally experienced side effects and had to continue working despite them.

The development of COVID-19 vaccines is not a sudden breakthrough, but the result of decades of basic research in multiple fields. This is a testament to the breadth and depth of human knowledge and how science works. The failure to communicate this has had tragic consequences.

The WHO has approved the first-ever malaria vaccine, which could save tens of thousands of children in sub-Saharan Africa. The quest for this vaccine has been underway for a hundred years, and a WHO official called it a "historic event."
The worst part of getting the vaccine was having to take off a Blink 182 sweatshirt and revealing a Blink 182 t-shirt underneath.

The tweet accuses Texas Governor Abbott of failing to confront the pandemic and botching the vaccine rollout, resulting in the deaths of over 44,000 Texans. It also blames him for the deaths of those who froze to death due to his prioritization of energy companies' profits over the safety of Texans. The tweet concludes by stating that Abbott is killing the people of Texas.
The statement that vaccines are unnatural is not a valid argument as many things we use in our daily lives are also unnatural, such as air travel, surgical anesthesia, and shoes.

A whistleblower engaged in Pfizer's pivotal COVID-19 vaccine trial has raised concerns about data integrity and regulatory oversight, according to a new investigation. The evidence presented in the investigation raises serious questions about the trial's credibility.

The approval of two vaccines made in India for emergency use is a source of pride for the country and demonstrates the commitment of the scientific community to achieve a self-reliant India based on care and compassion.

Using the tragedy of victims of criminal medical experiments in Auschwitz in a debate about vaccines and the pandemic is shameful and disrespectful to the victims. It is a sad symptom of moral and intellectual decline.
The author received the Covid-19 vaccine and celebrated by dancing Bhangra on a frozen lake to spread joy, hope, and positivity for everyone's health and wellbeing.
An mRNA vaccine sends a message to the immune system with instructions to kill the virus, but does not contain the virus itself. It disappears after delivering the message.
The tweet supports President Biden's decision to impose vaccine mandates and believes it will save lives and protect the economy. The tweet encourages others to retweet if they agree.
The speaker is expressing disbelief that people who stockpiled supplies during the pandemic for survival are now refusing to get vaccinated.
The author had a good day waiting in line to get vaccinated and encourages others who are eligible to do the same. They also reference a famous line from the Terminator movie franchise.

A 6-year-old confidently came into the vaccine clinic, took off his shirt, sat down, and told the nurse to administer the vaccine. The staff was impressed by his bravery and were afraid of him afterward.

A video clip shows Florida Governor Ron DeSantis accusing CBS's "60 Minutes" of selectively editing his comments on the state's vaccine distribution plan. DeSantis claims that the program omitted his explanation of why the state partnered with Publix, Walgreens, and CVS to distribute vaccines to seniors. The edited clip suggests that DeSantis gave preferential treatment to Publix, which had donated to his campaign.

Chloe Mrozak, a 24-year-old from Illinois, was arrested for allegedly using a fake COVID-19 vaccine card to enter Hawaii and avoid travel restrictions. The card had a misspelling of the vaccine manufacturer's name, reading "Maderna" instead of "Moderna."

A federal judge rejected the FDA's request to produce Pfizer Covid vaccine data at a rate of 500 pages per month and instead ordered a rate of 55,000 pages per month. The judge's decision can be read at a provided link.

A study has found that after three months, the vaccine effectiveness of Pfizer and Moderna against the Omicron variant is negative, with Pfizer customers being 76.5% more likely and Moderna customers being 39.3% more likely to be infected than unvaccinated people.

The person collapsed at home 9 months ago, 14 days after receiving their first AstraZeneca vaccine. They lost their left leg above the knee and have other health issues as a result of the vaccine. They were previously fit and healthy with no underlying health issues.
The hoarding of vaccines by the US and EU is preventing African countries from vaccinating their populations, which is a profoundly evil situation.
It is wrong that private pharmaceutical companies have taken control of the vaccine and we should not treat their names as a casual meme.

The booster shot was not meant to reduce symptoms but to maintain the belief that the vaccine could prevent COVID transmission. This belief was the basis for vaccine mandates, but it has been proven false.

The author received their first COVID-19 vaccine dose and feels grateful and privileged to live in a part of the world where they can receive it. They acknowledge the unequal distribution of vaccines around the world.
The Covid Passport is not just about checking vaccine status, but it is setting up a national caste system and a spying apparatus. It is a serious issue that people need to fight against.

A new study shows that vaccines and naturally acquired immunity effectively neutralize COVID variants, contradicting the fearmongering of Dr. Fauci and others. This is good news for everyone except bureaucrats and petty tyrants. The study found neutralizing antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 variants.
The idea of being anti-vax is ridiculous and humorous because vaccines are one of the greatest achievements of humankind in terms of preventing human suffering, yet some people are against them.

The Blackfeet Nation in Montana donated 750 surplus COVID-19 vaccines to residents in Alberta, Canada. A mobile clinic was set up at the border crossing, and people drove for hours and lined up for miles to receive the vaccine.
Olivia is thanked for urging young people to get vaccinated against COVID-19 and it is emphasized that if everyone gets vaccinated, the virus can be defeated.

The author is currently on a flight to the Bay Area and believes it is unsafe for unvaccinated individuals to be allowed to fly. They believe requiring the vaccine to fly is the minimum action that should be taken to prevent the spread of the virus.

The author criticizes journalists who denigrate natural immunity and cites a Harvard epidemiologist who argues that the case for COVID vaccine passports has been demolished. The article is linked to an article from the Foundation for Economic Education that discusses the epidemiologist's views on natural immunity and vaccine passports.
The person regrets getting the vaccine because it has led to them having too much fun and spending too much money.
The tweet implies that the speaker and their female friends are excited to receive the COVID-19 vaccine.

The public is urged to trust the vaccine and data, get vaccinated, and continue following SOPs to keep everyone safe. COVID-19 is becoming a pandemic of the unvaccinated, so it is important to work together to prevent its spread.
The first shipment of coronavirus vaccine has left Pfizer's facility near Kalamazoo, Michigan, carried by UPS and FedEx trucks.

The use of vaccine passports creates a two-tiered society and discriminates against individuals based on their personal health decisions. They have failed to achieve their intended purpose and have caused harm to society.

The author, who experienced actual fascist policies in America and was sent to an internment camp because of their race, dismisses claims of fascism over vaccine requirements as laughable and explains that they know what fascism is and this isn't it.

The proposal suggests paying everyone $1500 to get vaccinated, which would serve as a stimulus check and vaccine incentive. This would result in more people getting vaccinated, saving lives, and providing financial assistance. The $400 billion cost would be offset by the economic boost from ending the pandemic. The proposal is being shared on social media with the hashtag #vaccinestimulus.
Dr. Malone, the inventor of mRNA vaccine technology, has the right to state his scientific opinion on Covid vaccines, regardless of whether he is right or wrong. Suspending him is a disgrace.
The author suggests that instead of calling them "vaccine passports," they should be referred to as "immunization records" because they have always been required for jobs and school.
Those who speak out against the vaccine while having been vaccinated themselves are hypocrites who put others at risk by spreading misinformation.
mRNA vaccines instruct the body to create a target and then trigger an immune response against it.
The FDA and CDC have recommended a pause in the use of the Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine out of caution.
The speaker acknowledges that they don't know what's in various substances, including vaccines, and also mentions consuming hot dogs.
Orlando Magic player Jonathan Isaac has stated that he will not be getting the COVID-19 vaccine as he believes he has natural immunity and data shows he is not at risk from the virus.

Stephen A. Smith, who caught Covid and was hospitalized with severe symptoms, believes that the fact that he only almost died is proof that the vaccine he received worked. This is being seen as an example of peak stupidity.
Seattle firefighters and police officers who were fired for not complying with the vaccine mandate are now volunteering to feed the homeless.

A study conducted by Cleveland Clinic on 52,238 employees has found that unvaccinated individuals who have previously had COVID-19 have the same risk of re-infection as those who have had COVID-19 and received the vaccine.
BTS member Jimin has donated KRW100 million to Rotary to help provide polio vaccines to children. The donation will aid the World Health Organization in its efforts to eradicate polio.

Despite positive economic and public health indicators, only 30% of the country believes the US is on the right track, indicating a messaging problem for the Democratic Party. The Dow is over 36,000, unemployment has dropped, over 5 million jobs have been added, and 220 million vaccines have been administered in 10 months.

The speaker had a conversation with President Biden about the significance of young people getting vaccinated. They encourage people to visit a website to learn more about vaccines and find a vaccination center. It is free, easy, and crucial.

The Biden administration has confirmed that 20 million doses of the Covid-19 vaccine are missing. Earlier, there were suspicions about the federal vaccine supply being less than expected, and the author suggested looking to Jared for answers. The author repeats this suggestion.
Norway has returned to normalcy without any mask mandates, vaccine mandates, or social distancing mandates due to following the science.
Vaccine mandates are causing individuals who do not believe in science, medicine, or public safety to quit their jobs as teachers, nurses, and cops. The speaker sees no downside to this.
The statement warns people not to take Joe Rogan's opinions seriously as he is not a scientist. The statement is followed by a reminder to get vaccinated by the Jonas Brothers and Big Bird.

The speaker called Ted Cruz's office to make an appointment to discuss their blood pressure, but was told that the Senator was not qualified to give medical advice and should call their doctor. The speaker then asked the office to stop giving advice about vaccines in relation to COVID-19.

Stanley Johnson's actions, including breaking lockdown rules and receiving a second vaccine before vulnerable individuals have received their first, highlight the hypocrisy, cronyism, and elitism of the current Conservative government.

A Utah teacher was fired after making comments about Trump, vaccines, and FOX News to her conservative students. The incident has sparked controversy, with some calling for the teacher to be reinstated.
The tweet features a GIF of a group of friends dancing and celebrating after getting the COVID-19 vaccine.

Vaccines were developed against the original strain of COVID-19, but by the time vaccination efforts ramped up, the delta strain had taken over, leading to vaccinated people still being able to catch COVID-19.
The vaccine helps reduce symptoms, hospitalizations, and deaths from COVID-19, and also prevents healthcare workers from being overworked and hospitals from becoming overcrowded.

Wisconsin Republican lawmaker Andre Jacque, who sponsored bills banning mask and vaccine mandates, is now on a ventilator fighting for his life after contracting COVID-19 just days after attending a maskless committee meeting. The tweet urges people who are vaccinated to retweet.
The speaker is calling for an immediate ban on all vaccine mandates and wants to spread the message.

The author accuses Joe Biden of being dishonest for not mentioning naturally acquired immunity, which is more durable than the vaccine and an estimated 100 million Americans already have it. The author believes there is no scientific justification for this omission and that the Biden administration does not care.

A new variant of SARS-CoV-2, called C.1.2, has been identified in South Africa and other countries. There are concerns that it may be more infectious and able to evade vaccines. The mutation rate of C.1.2 is nearly twice as fast as other variants.

Kevin Durant has tested positive for COVID-19, leaving the Brooklyn Nets with few eligible players. Kyrie Irving, who refused to get vaccinated, is now the only player available to play, despite being criticized by the media for being a selfish teammate.
A clip from the Daily Show shows people fighting against seat belt mandates in the 80s, which is surreal given today's climate on masks and COVID vaccines.

UNICEF supporters BTS discuss the COVID-19 pandemic, vaccines, and the importance of making collective choices for a better future. They emphasize the need to believe in possibilities and hope, even in the face of unexpected challenges, in order to discover new paths forward. #UNGA

The person's mother had a bad reaction to Covid-19 and the vaccine, resulting in amputation below the knees and the impending loss of most of her hands. They are seeking help with medical bills and adjustments to make her comfortable. They express gratitude for her life and ask for blessings.

American and Southwest Airlines will continue to enforce vaccine mandates despite Texas Governor Greg Abbott's ban, in accordance with the Biden administration's orders. Support for their decision is encouraged.

The tweet praises the work of Seth MacFarlane and the Family Guy team for their brilliant explanation of how vaccines work. The author expresses confusion about people who still don't understand vaccines after watching the video.

The US Supreme Court has repeated COVID misinformation, including claims that 100,000 children are on ventilators, a vaccine mandate would prevent all US cases, and COVID deaths are at an all-time high.

The number of Covid deaths in the US in the last two years has surpassed the number of AIDS deaths from 1981-2000, despite the availability of a vaccine. The author believes future generations will be shocked by the ignorance and acceptance of such high death tolls.

The author saw an early release of a whistleblower video from Project Veritas that is about to be released and believes that every person who was fired or not granted a religious exemption for the vaccine mandate should see it as it is explosive.

The University of Connecticut will fine and block internet access to students who do not get vaccinated, but the author believes that there is something evil involved with the vaccines and will never get vaccinated.

The COVID-19 pandemic will not end magically on January 1st, 2021. It will only slow down and ultimately end through actions such as vaccines, masks, and avoiding crowds. Time alone will not end the pandemic.

Scientists at Walter Reed Army Institute of Research have developed a vaccine called the 'Spike Ferritin Nanoparticle COVID-19 vaccine' or SpFN, which protects people from COVID-19 and all its variants, including Omicron. The announcement of the vaccine is expected soon.

A federal judge has ruled in favor of a Kentucky hospital system's COVID vaccine mandate, rejecting a legal request to end the mandate by anti-vaxxer hospital employees. These employees will now be fired for putting their patients and coworkers' lives at risk.
The speaker panicked when the person administering their vaccine presented the vial like a sommelier presenting a wine bottle, and ended up awkwardly thanking them.
Healthcare workers who risked their lives during the pandemic do not deserve to be treated with contempt by those who refuse to get vaccinated and may end up needing their care.
Accept whichever vaccine you get and don't be picky about the brand.
Vaccine mandates are causing individuals who do not believe in science, medicine, or public safety to quit or retire, which is seen as a positive outcome.

A diagram of an electric circuit for a guitar pedal has been falsely shared in Italy as the 5G chip that has been inserted in the COVID-19 vaccine. The tweet suggests that putting the guitar pedal circuit in the vaccine would be an excellent idea.
Restaurants and bars in Calgary are requiring vaccine passports for patio seating, leading some people to bring their own food and have picnics on the street.
Scientists have conducted successful trials of a vaccine against Alzheimer's disease in mice, which reversed memory loss. The researchers are now eager to move on to human trials.
The speaker will oppose compulsory vaccines for NHS staff and vaccine passports as they believe it will create division instead of cooperation and unity.
Vaccines eradicated polio and smallpox, not herd immunity.

The speaker's 5-year-old daughter, who is immuno-suppressed due to cancer and transplant, did not build antibodies to vaccines. The speaker emphasizes the importance of vaccinating, masking up, and taking the pandemic seriously to protect vulnerable individuals like their daughter.

A physician and director of the Medical Ethics Program at UC Irvine has been put on leave by the University of California for challenging their vaccine mandate in court. The individual describes the details in a post.

The Indian government needs to adopt a more humble approach, implement a clear vaccine strategy, and provide income support to contain the COVID-19 virus and its related damage. The current mix of arrogance and suppression of the truth is causing the deaths of hundreds of thousands of people.
The author's brother and his wife, who were both anti-vaccine, died from COVID-19. The author urges people to get vaccinated and wear masks.

Texas has reported over 50,000 confirmed coronavirus cases among students in just a few weeks, leading to the temporary closure of several school districts. The state has also recorded 59 child COVID-19 deaths as of September 3.
The author criticizes the NFL's focus on vaccines for its players, arguing that the league should prioritize addressing the systemic abuse experienced by many of its current and former players.
The author visited a vaccination center at Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia Hospital in India and expressed pride in the country's achievement of a "Vaccine Century" and the protection it provides to citizens.

The tweet expresses a belief that Emmanuel Macron, Justin Trudeau, and Joe Biden are working together to use fear to force vaccinations and vaccine passports on citizens. The author considers them to be evil and totalitarian leaders and supports the resistance against these measures in France.

The speaker has no problem with people getting the vaccine, but they personally will never get it because they believe Big Pharma is evil. They are healthy, young, in shape, and not afraid of Covid-19.

The author suggests that people were lied to about the effectiveness of vaccines and are now being lied to again instead of admitting the mistake. They encourage people not to be angry at the unvaccinated but to reflect on their own gullibility.

A North Carolina police chief has been placed on two weeks unpaid leave and six months probation for instructing his officers to visit a "self-vaccination" clinic where they could obtain fake vaccine cards. There is a call for him to be fired.

The claim that there is no FDA approved COVID-19 vaccine available in the United States and that Pfizer has no plans to make one available soon has been fact-checked and found to be true. The author conducted their own research and was surprised by their findings.
The Moderna/NIH vaccine was created in partnership with President Trump on January 13, 2020, and this is good news for America and the world.

Two individuals convinced anti-vaxxer Piers Corbyn to take £10,000 he thought came from AstraZeneca to stop criticising their vaccine, but it was actually monopoly money and the whole thing was recorded.

The Biden administration is threatening Marines with the loss of their pensions, tuition assistance, and access to the G.I. bill if they refuse to take the COVID-19 vaccine, which is being seen as a form of medical tyranny.
The person took the vaccine and did not experience any drastic side effects, and now feels comfortable hanging out with friends.

AT&T has become the largest private company in the US to mandate vaccines for its workers and has threatened to fire employees who do not comply with the deadline. The decision is aimed at protecting the lives of employees and customers.

BioNTech, the maker of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine, has developed a potential mRNA vaccine for multiple sclerosis. A study in mice has shown promising results in improving symptoms and stopping MS progression.

The tweet argues that Twitter should not be judging Dr. Malone, the inventor of mRNA vaccine technology, and that if he is concerned about the vaccines, everyone should be. The tweet also calls for an end to censorship of whistleblowing experts and the restoration of Dr. Malone's account.

The speaker is frustrated with finance professionals who prioritize financial gain over ethical considerations, citing an example of a finance bro who dismissed the importance of lifting vaccine patents for the sake of human life.
United Airlines is firing 600 workers who have refused to comply with the company's vaccine mandate unless they get vaccinated. The announcement has been made to keep the skies safe.
Social movements in São Paulo are protesting for vaccines, food, and the immediate impeachment of Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro. The protests are taking place on Paulista Avenue.

BBC presenter Lisa Shaw died due to complications from the AstraZeneca Covid vaccine, according to a coroner's report. She developed headaches a week after her first dose and suffered blood clots in the brain, ultimately leading to her death.
The tweet criticizes people who refuse to get vaccinated but then seek medical help when they contract COVID-19, questioning why they trust doctors only after getting sick.
The tweet suggests that hoarding vaccines, creating manufacturing inequity, and allowing conditions for the emergence of variants can lead to banning and isolating certain groups.

Governors were informed by the US Department of Health and Human Services that there was a strategic reserve of COVID-19 vaccines, but it now appears that no reserve exists. The Trump administration is being called upon to explain this deception.
The person is confused about how COVID cases can be up 300% from last year when 75% of Americans are now vaccinated. They believe it must be "liberal science and math."

The author is frustrated with the state of Tennessee, as they have seen 50 people in their ER who have been swabbed for COVID-19, and 47 of them have tested positive. None of these individuals were vaccinated, and despite this, they still have no plans to get vaccinated. The author feels that there is no way to fix this situation.

Joe Biden's presidency has been marked by several crises, including a gas crisis, border crisis, closed schools, rising inflation, and an increase in crime in major cities. He has also been criticized for taking credit for President Trump's vaccine efforts and plans to raise taxes. Additionally, Israel is currently under attack.
The author met a man from Israel who showed him his vaccine passport on his smartphone. The man expressed confusion about why Americans politicize everything.

The author, who has worked in ICU settings in multiple states since March 2020, has observed a consistent pattern of patients with severely damaged lungs who could have been saved by receiving two doses of a vaccine.

America's Frontline Doctors has filed a lawsuit in federal court seeking a temporary restraining order against the use of the COVID-19 vaccine in children, citing the protection of civil liberties and bodily integrity.

The speaker is in favor of vaccines and has been vaccinated themselves, but they are against vaccine mandates and passports as they believe they are immoral and lack evidence. They are confused as to why some people see these beliefs as contradictory.

Polio killed 3,145 Americans at its peak in 1952, but after a vaccine became available in 1955, all 50 states passed laws requiring vaccination before kids can enter public schools. In contrast, COVID has killed 345,000 Americans in 2020 and 416,000 more so far in 2021.
The FDA has given full and final approval to the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine, confirming its safety and effectiveness. People are encouraged to get vaccinated to end the pandemic.
The author expresses excitement for the activation of vaccine chips and imagines a scenario where everyone chants "all hail plankton" in unison.
The CEO of The Daily Wire, Jeremy Boreing, has stated that the company will not be enforcing Joe Biden's vaccine mandate and will use legal action to resist it. The Daily Wire has over 100 employees.

The speaker's friend and partner at 8VC lost his uncle to COVID-19 in India, where the pandemic is worsening. The speaker will donate $50 for every retweet, up to $125,000 USD, to help with efforts in India.

The author gives a special mention to @MBofficialTeam for volunteering on the frontlines during the pandemic and thanks the villagers for understanding the importance of vaccines and getting vaccinated. The author urges everyone to get vaccinated and stay safe.
The COVID vaccine does not prevent you from getting COVID, but it reduces the severity of symptoms and lowers the risk of death. Some people seem to be unaware of this fact.
The speaker is questioning the effectiveness of receiving three polio vaccines in nine months if they still contracted polio.
The tweet is directed at Nicki Minaj and mentions that both the author and Nicki are rappers. The author then shares a rap they made about the vaccine and includes a link to the rap.
The statement is not factual and appears to be a joke or a fictional story. It is not a valid reason to discourage people from getting vaccinated.

Antivaxxers in Greece have been paying doctors to give them shots of bacteriostatic water instead of the COVID-19 vaccine, but the doctors have been pocketing the money and giving them the real shot anyway.
Disney and other Florida-based businesses have temporarily stopped their COVID-19 vaccine mandates and are rehiring employees who were fired for refusing to get vaccinated.

The tweet accuses Bill Gates of being directly involved in various aspects of the pandemic, including the Wuhan lab, vaccine development, and censorship. It also claims that he is purchasing a lot of land while people suffer from lockdowns, and suggests that he should be arrested for crimes against humanity.
The author is urging for the breaking of patents on vaccines and for global manufacturing to begin.
The author urges people not to delay getting vaccinated against COVID-19, as the majority of hospitalized patients are unvaccinated and some are very sick, including young adults.
There is a shortage of many things in the country, but COVID vaccines and booster shots are not among them.
There is no vaccine for stupidity and even if there was, those who are stupid would not take it.
The person received the Pfizer COVID vaccine and is experiencing no negative side effects, but is frustrated with dealing with people they perceive as morons.
The definition of anti-vax has expanded to include those who refuse one vaccine, discuss negative side effects of the Covid vaccine, or decline a booster shot.
The writer's best friend's parents have received their COVID-19 vaccines, which is a great thing.
Framing vaccination as a personal decision rather than an act of community care shows a lack of understanding of the purpose of vaccines.

A Texas judge has ruled in favor of Southwest Airlines' pilot vaccine mandate, stating that it improves air travel safety and working conditions for all pilots. This is a major legal precedent and a loss for Governor Abbott.
The statement advocates against lockdowns, mask mandates, vaccine mandates, and vaccine passports and calls for people to retweet if they agree.

California Governor Gavin Newsom is facing a Republican recall and is urging Californians to vote no and return their ballots by September 14th at 8PM. The issues at stake include vaccines, climate change, immigrant rights, minimum wage, reproductive rights, gun safety, and more.
Jurgen Klopp, the manager of Liverpool Football Club, compared being unvaccinated against COVID-19 to drinking and driving, stating that both put others at risk and are irresponsible actions.
All three vaccines (Pfizer, Moderna, and Oxford) are effective, protective, and safe.
The author has no sympathy for police officers and firefighters who refuse to take the COVID-19 vaccine despite having taken other vaccines in the past without complaint.
A California firefighter has been put on administrative leave for smearing feces on his vaccine non-compliance letter. There are calls for him to be fired.
President Biden criticized Fox News and other right-wing networks for spreading anti-vaccine misinformation and making money by peddling lies, which he says is killing their own customers.
